generated_body: The article titled "Poll: Most voters remain unmovable in impeachment views" is likely to provide an analysis of recent polling data regarding public opinion on impeachment. Readers can expect to find insights into the demographics of those polled, including party affiliation and age groups. The article may also discuss trends over time, indicating whether opinions have shifted or remained stable. Additionally, it could explore the implications of these findings for political leaders and upcoming elections, helping to contextualize the significance of the poll results in the current political landscape.
